mapper.select: WITH subTable AS ( select room.chatRoomNum, room.chat_type, room.chat_title, content.chatContentNum from dk_chat_room room inner join dk_chat_member member on room.chatRoomNum = member.chatRoomNum inner join dk_chat_content content on member.chatRoomNum = content.chatRoomNum where member.chat_memberId = #{userId} and member.present_position = 0 ) select chatRoomNum, chat_type, chat_title from subTable where chatContentNum in (select max(chatContentNum)from subTable group by subTable.chatRoomNum) order by subTable.chatContentNum desc
